summary:
NOW IMPROVED! The bards\' song \"Age of Aggression\". Taking the three solos from in game mixed together for your pleasure.

This resource is supplied in *.wav and *.mp3 format, also you can use the *.xwm to replace data/music/ whatever you name it in the right folder so you can hear it in game, e.g. data/music/special/mus_maintheme.xwm
descriptionHtml:
NOW IMPROVED! The bards\' song \"Age of Aggression\". Taking the three solos from in game mixed together for your pleasure.

This resource is supplied in *.wav and *.mp3 format, also you can use the *.xwm to replace data/music/ whatever you name it in the right folder so you can hear it in game, e.g. data/music/special/mus_maintheme.xwm
author: tricolour
